scripts.test-ios-release: detox build -c ios.sim.release && detox test -c ios.sim.release && jest --testPathPattern . --config=./jest/config.json
scripts.test-android-release: detox build -c android.emu.release && detox test -c android.emu.release && jest --testPathPattern . --config=./jest/config.json
scripts.test-android-debug: detox build -c android.emu.debug && detox test -c android.emu.debug --loglevel verbose && jest --testPathPattern . --config=./jest/config.json
scripts.test-ios-debug: detox build -c ios.sim.debug && detox test -c ios.sim.debug

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/Boilerplate.xcodeproj -scheme Boilerplate -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 7

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/Boilerplate.xcodeproj -scheme Boilerplate -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7

android.emu.debug.build: export ENVFILE=.env.dev && pushd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: Nexus_5X_API_26
